comment.author: 허현옥
comment.content: Thank you for all your work. However why don't we share library file(.jar) through CVS too. It may takes some time to download cvs for the first but, that will give us shorter time to run programs. I liked your style that have all library in one folder but after cvs, I think even share library is more efficient to have same dev environment I think...( it is only my opinion if you have a different idea you don't have to...^^)

comment.author: 부기흡
comment.content: I tried to avoid it. it is about 12 MB total. I thought it would be easy enough for you to copy the Hibernate jar files into the jars folder. Will consider though.

post.content:
Worked on Address, and made minor API adjustments on User & UserRoles.

How to run:
1) Synchronize Coska_MySchool (to update DB scripts)
2) Synchronize COSKA_MySchool_Model (to update API & JUnit tests)
3) Run uninstall.bat (to remove previous database if you have)
4) Run install.bat (to install a new database)
5) Go to the junit folder.
6) Right-click on AllTest.java.
7) Run As -> JUnit Test

Currently there are 21 failures.
Let me know if you need help with running this test.

Enjoy.
post.title: JUnit moved up to 22%
